chapters.title: Chapter 42: Falme
chapters.info: Tuli, p. 601 (528)—Name given by Renna to Egwene when she finds out that Egwene has been channeling without permission. According to Renna, this name was originally held by her pet cat that she had as a child. It seems to fit, since she treats Egwene like a pet as well. See al'Vere, Egwene; Emain, Renna.
